name: REZD
author: Ojamanjo
notes: Went from Gold 5(i think?) to L3 w/a 20 card STTG REZD but kept getting Bacon AND REZD in opening hand so I took out Curse of Anubis (which I never used) and added Gozuki+Insight. No Bacon in hand for my 5 straight L3 games (but those opponents weren't too challenging either). Divine Wrath on a Kuriboh felt good.
